profile.en:
The mysterious fifth agent of Millennium's secret spy agency, C&C.

Although she technically belongs to C&C, she's been Rio's exclusive maid and bodyguard for some time, so few know who Toki is. While she is a superior secret agent who's at ease with high-tech weaponry and technology, she seems to be a bit lonely as she always works solo.
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、秘密組織「C&C」の5番目のエージェント。

C&C所属だが、これまではリオの専属メイド兼ボディーガードとして活動してきたため、トキの顔を知っている人はほとんどいない。ハイテク兵器や技術に基づいて戦う優れたエージェント。今までは単独行動がメインだったが、実は寂しがり屋という一面も。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、秘密組織「C&C」の5番目のエージェント。

C&C所属だが、これまではリオの専属メイド兼ボディーガードとして活動してきたため、トキの顔を知っている人はほとんどいない。ハイテク兵器や技術に基づいて戦う優れたエージェント。今までは単独行動がメインだったが、実は寂しがり屋という一面も。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年科学学园所属，秘密组织「C&C」的第五个特务。

虽然隶属C&C，但至今为止都以莉央专属女仆兼保镳的身分活动，所以几乎没有人知道季的长相。是善于使用高科技武器和技术战斗的优秀特务。虽然一直以单独行动为主，其实也有害怕寂寞的一面。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、秘密組織「C&C」の5番目のエージェント。

C&C所属だが、これまではリオの専属メイド兼ボディーガードとして活動してきたため、トキの顔を知っている人はほとんどいない。ハイテク兵器や技術に基づいて戦う優れたエージェント。今までは単独行動がメインだったが、実は寂しがり屋という一面も。

gacha.en: Leave it to me. I'm both the perfect agent and the perfect maid.

私は完璧なエージェントであり、メイドですので

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.jp: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来日鞠遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵去见研讨会的部长莉音。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来阳葵遭到某人的袭击。

desc.jp: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.

desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音与阳葵秘密会见，开始了对当前情况的梳理。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari plotted the conflict between the Game Development Department and C&C, and found out Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音和阳葵共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉音认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而阳葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

desc.en: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari insisted on her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and the AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将日鞠困住，但日鞠轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时日鞠却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。

desc.en: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.jp: The visitor at the Game Development Department is none other than Rio, the president of Seminar. Rio explains that Aris is actually a "princess of the Nameless Gods," and refers to her as a demon lord. Everyone in the room is outraged, and Rio dispassionately describes what kind of future Aris will bring about. Tensions are about to explode, when the fifth member of C&C arrives.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉音。莉音说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉音很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 来到游戏开发部的是研讨会部长莉央。莉央说爱丽丝是「无名诸神的王女」，并说爱丽丝是魔王。虽然在场的所有人都很愤怒，但莉央很平静地在谈论爱丽丝可能会造成的未来。正当要爆发冲突时，C&C的第五个成员登场了。

desc.en: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.jp: Rio recalled the recent destructive event and told everyone the true identity of Aris: she's not some students, but the commander of the Army "Divi: Sion," the princess of the Nameless Gods AL-1S. No one could accept that explanation, and Rio made a simile with games: Aris was in fact the demon lord that was born to destroy the world.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉央则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音以最近发生的那件毁灭性事件为切入点，向众人阐述了爱丽丝的真实身份：她并非什么学生，而是Divi:Sion军队的指挥官、无名众神的公主AL-1S。众人无法接受这一解释，而莉音则用游戏作了简单的阐述：爱丽丝是为了毁灭这个世界而生的“魔王”。

desc.en: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones were partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.jp: Rio apologized to everyone that it was her fault to let Aris get in touch with those robots. Despite that, Rio said this time was very fortunate, as the ones were partly broken. But she stressed that there might be no such luck in the future. Rio said that there was only one way to solve.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向众人道歉，表示让爱丽丝接触到那些机器人是她的失误。尽管如此，会长表示此次非常幸运，因为爱丽丝接触到的个体是比较不完整的，但强调之后或许就不会有如此运气。莉央表示，此种方法只有一种解决方案。

desc.en: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.jp: Everyone outraged upon hearing this. The president continued explaining her solution: to destroy Aris' halo, i.e. to kill her. Such remarks even angered Sensei. Rio expressed her surprise about the fact that Aris' having a halo, despite her being a robot. No agreement made, Rio called Neru who was standing by all the time.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉央首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉央叫来了一直在一旁的尼禄清场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人与会长发生了争执。会长继续阐述其解决方案：将爱丽丝的光环破坏掉，即杀死爱丽丝。此言一出甚至招致老师对其的不满。莉音首先表示了对爱丽丝作为一台机械却拥有光环一事的惊讶，随后与老师争辩。争辩无果，莉音叫来了一直在一旁的宁瑠清场。

desc.en: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.jp: Rio said that the C&C was under her direct command after all. She also stressed that no one should be harmed if no resistance occurred. Yet Neru was pretty upset at Rio's actions as well and began revolting; but Rio was too familiar with Neru, and was well prepared for that.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央表示，C&C本就直属她管理。莉央强调众人若不想受伤则不应做任何抵抗。然而尼禄本身也对莉央的做法愤愤不平，因而开始反抗‘；但莉央很熟悉尼禄，并早就做好了应对手段。

desc.en: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.jp: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击倒AMAS，尼禄和时展开了追逐战。但最后尼禄却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击倒AMAS，妮露和时展开了追逐战。但最后妮露却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。

desc.en: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.jp: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将尼禄打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉音无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将妮露打倒并压制。

desc.en: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.jp: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei demanded Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师要求莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠被压制后，莉音指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉音严厉警告。老师要求莉音住手，莉音反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉音的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师要求莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

desc.en: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.jp: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others is nowhere near being a fault, and stated again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everything and was afraid to harm everyone even more. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。尼禄在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程师部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉音远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。宁瑠在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。妮露在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。

desc.en: Aris accepted what Rio said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.jp: Aris accepted what Rio said, and tried to explain to everyone in her words, hoping that everyone could understand her choice. Aris expressed her thanks for everyone accompanying her, and said that she was happy all the time.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝接受了莉央的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝接受了莉音的话，并试图向大家重新解释，希望所有人能够理解她的选择。爱丽丝表达了对众人一直陪伴着她的谢意，表示自己一直以来都很开心。

desc.en: Not until Rio's left could anyone even move a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.jp: Not until Rio's left could anyone even move a finger. Everyone was crashed with a feeling of powerlessness. Aris, had since gone long.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。爱丽丝，就此不见。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到莉音走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。爱丽丝，就此不见。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 直到莉央走前，所有人都被压制的死死的，一根手指头都动不了。众人被无力感压垮。爱丽丝，就此不见。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉音创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，妮露提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_cn: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.jp: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.zh_cn: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“埃里都”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千禧年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程师部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程师部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程师部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.jp: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。尼禄罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。真理社则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了季当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。宁瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程师部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。妮露罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。真理会则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.jp: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 被莉音监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉音创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。

desc.en: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.jp: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。

desc.en: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.jp: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵对莉音将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉音则仍希望阳葵能理解她，并表示阳葵和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。

desc.en: The Engineering Department, Game Development Department and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department, Game Development Department and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时原以为尼禄会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含尼禄在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季原以为宁瑠会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含宁瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时原以为妮露会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含妮露在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为尼禄会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为宁瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为妮露会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en: Toki was interrupted before she could finish. Neru said she was looking for revenge here and, even after that, it would be not late to rescue Aris.
desc.jp: Toki was interrupted before she could finish. Neru said she was looking for revenge here and, even after that, it would be not late to rescue Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时话都没说完就被打断。尼禄表示自己是来复仇的，并且就算那样后，救出爱丽丝也完全不迟。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季话都没说完就被打断。宁瑠表示自己是来复仇的，并且就算那样后，救出爱丽丝也完全不迟。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时话都没说完就被打断。妮露表示自己是来复仇的，并且就算那样后，救出爱丽丝也完全不迟。

desc.en: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: The C&C succeed in pinning down Toki with a powerful pincer attack. Toki retaliates by changing the structure of Eridu to isolate Neru. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department's uninterrupted progress is cut off with the appearance of Rio's powerful weapon, the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了尼禄。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C强大的夹攻成功让季处于劣势。季变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了宁瑠。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉音的强大兵器前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C强大的夹攻成功让时处于劣势。时变更了埃里都的结构，借此孤立了妮露。另一方面，原本都很顺利的游戏开发部遇见了莉央的强大兵器前卫君。

desc.en: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: While the members of the C&C stand off against Toki, Rio (having already predicted that Sensei and the Game Development Department would come to Aris' rescue) attempts to stop the party in their path with the use of a powerful robot called the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在C&C和季对峙的时候，莉音早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在C&C和时对峙的时候，莉央早已察觉到老师和游戏开发部前来拯救爱丽丝，于是派遣强大的机器人前卫君去阻止游戏开发部一行人。

desc.en: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.jp: C&C and Toki were on a par with each other. Toki learned the difference between C&C and the other clubs. But by manipulating the positions of the city's buildings, she isolated the other members and made Neru to combat without others' assistance.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将尼禄与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C与季打的有来有回。季领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将宁瑠与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C与时打的有来有回。时领悟到了C&C这一社团的不同之处，但她通过控制都市建筑物的移动将妮露与其他成员隔离，让其在毫无支援配合的情况下行动。

desc.en: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.jp: The communication with Veritas was cut off all at once, and everyone was greeted by Rio. Rio wasn't surprised by the current situation, and mentioned the "Trolley Problem" with Sensei - which repeated her theory of "sacrificing little in exchange of the lives of the most". Momoi cut it off and made her position clear and loud. Seeing no turning back, Rio put Avant Guard into use.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 与真理社的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 与贝里塔斯的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉音的问候。莉音对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃井打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉音见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 与真理会的通讯突然中断，取而代之的是莉央的问候。莉央对形势并不感到惊讶，并向老师提出了“电车难题”——同样是在重复一开始“以少数者的伤亡换大多数的生存”的理论。桃打断了对话，阐明自己只想把爱丽丝带回来。莉央见对话再无挽回，启用了前卫君。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Though ugly, the firepower of the Avant Guard was not meant to be underestimated. The GDD and the ED lost the battle against Avant Guard at last.
desc.jp: Though ugly, the firepower of the Avant Guard was not meant to be underestimated. The GDD and the ED lost the battle against Avant Guard at last.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然长相丑陋，但前卫君的实力不可小觑。游戏开发部与工程部一行人最终不敌前卫君，作战失败。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然长相丑陋，但前卫君的实力不可小觑。游戏开发部与工程师部一行人最终不敌前卫君，作战失败。

desc.en: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.jp: Since Neru was not there, it was then did everyone realize that it was the best time for the President to suppress Sensei. The President said it was all their doings and commanded Avant Guard to end all of this.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为尼禄不在身边，众人这才发现这正是会长压制老师的最好时机。会长表示这正好是他们自己所造成，并命令前卫君终结这一切。

desc.en: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.jp: Rio's victory is sealed in front of Himari, but Himari succeeds in escaping with Eimi's help. Meanwhile, cut off from Veritas's support, the Game Development Department find themselves with their backs against the wall until they are dramatically rescued by Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在莉央笃定自己能获胜时，日鞠在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了真理社支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，真理社的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在莉音笃定自己能获胜时，阳葵在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了贝里塔斯支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，贝里塔斯的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在莉央笃定自己能获胜时，日鞠在英美的协助下成功脱逃了。另一方面，少了真理会支持的游戏开发部面临空前的危机，真理会的副部长千寻在紧要关头戏剧性地出现了。

desc.en: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: Neru and Toki were at a deadlock. The GDD was no match of the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄与时陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠与季陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露与时陷入僵局，争执不下。游戏开发部一行人不敌前卫君。

desc.en: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.jp: Rio described the current situation. Himari expressed her approval of the cleverness of Rio's plan, saying that "maybe you're right", but still disagreed with Rio's original intent. Himari said her "never-looking-back" personality was both an advantage and a disadvantage. She asked Rio "whether she had ever talked to other people or not?" Rio was very confused when the prison was attacked.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向日鞠讲述了自己计划的当前进度。日鞠对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。日鞠表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音向阳葵讲述了自己计划的当前进度。阳葵对莉音计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉音的本来目的。阳葵表示莉音“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉音“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉音正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央向日鞠讲述了自己计划的当前进度。日鞠对莉央计划的高明表示认可、“或许是对的”，但仍不同意莉央的本来目的。日鞠表示莉央“头也不回”的特质既是优点也是缺点，并反问莉央“是否有与其他人交谈过”。莉央正在迷惑之际，监狱突然遭到攻击。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.jp: Rio was in great shock, wondering who could possibly be out of her calculation It turned out to be Eimi from Himari's club. Though only to share the pudding with Himari and it had no effect for the others, Himari said that she still trusted her younger members.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是日鞠社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但日鞠则表示她信任她的后辈们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音大为震惊，怀疑究竟是谁脱离了她的计算。原来是阳葵社团里的后辈英美前来救援，虽然理由仅仅是为了和部长共享布丁。英美承认这么做对其他人意义并不是很大，但阳葵则表示她信任她的后辈们。

desc.en: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.jp: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉音的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。

desc.en: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data kept updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.jp: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data kept updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时与尼禄纠缠着。时发现尼禄并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现尼禄的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季与宁瑠纠缠着。季发现宁瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现宁瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉音此时指示季暂时撤退。因为季跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时与妮露纠缠着。时发现妮露并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现妮露的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。

desc.en: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.jp: The combat capabilities of Abi-Eshuh leave everyone stunned. Identifying the weapon's weaknesses based on Akane's advice, Sensei and Neru attempt to draw the battle to aerial warfare. Toki, anticipating such a move, takes this in stride and Neru ends up seriously injured. The group quickly retreats.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和尼禄找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让尼禄受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在朱音的建议下，老师和宁瑠找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但季似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让宁瑠受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 「Abi-Eshuh」的威力让大家都相当惊讶。在茜的建议下，老师和妮露找出了弱点，企图把战斗引导为空中战。但时似乎早已预料到这一点，活跃的表现让妮露受到重伤，一行人逼不得已只好先撤退。

desc.en: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.jp: C&C was unable to inflict any damage to the suit, as Chihiro reported. Chihiro also noticed that it seemed that all the electricity and computing power were all on this suit, making it even be able to predict the future. On hearing this, the GDD expressed nothing but "isn't that just like a cheater?!" Sensei was out of options, yet Akane suddenly pointed it out that, this suit was designed to function on the ground.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时茜突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时朱音突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C没对这个机甲造成一点伤害，千寻报告了这点。同时千寻还注意到，都市的全部电力和算力都集中在了这套机甲上，使它几乎甚至可以确定未来。听闻此话的游戏开发部众人纷纷表示“这不和作弊一样？！”老师对此毫无办法，而这时茜突然指出，这套装甲是为地面作战设计。

desc.en: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.jp: Sensei realized something all of a sudden, commanding Neru to get to the rooftop. Rio said it was useless to do so, but Sensei didn't respond. Toki fired at Neru and blew up the rooftop, as the two falling down from the top.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令尼禄将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。时向尼禄开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令宁瑠将战场转移到房顶上。莉音表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。季向宁瑠开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然意识到了什么，命令妮露将战场转移到房顶上。莉央表示转移到楼顶同样没有，但老师笑而不语。时向妮露开炮，炸掉了房顶，两人从空中摔落。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

name.en: How About Falling Down The Sky
name.jp: How About Falling Down The Sky

desc.en: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.
desc.jp: Sensei finally revealed the true intent: if it was designed to battle on the ground, then how about falling from the sky? The fact proved it right. Though only in a flash, Yuzu had already spotted its weakness.
desc.zh_cn: 老师的意图此时终于表现出来：既然是为地面作战设计，在空中又怎么样呢？事实证明的确如此。虽然只有一瞬间的时间，但柚子已经完全注意到了其弱点所在。

desc.en: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.jp: Neru failed to win at last. Rio instructed Toki to get Sensei, but right at this moment a slight flaw occurred on the suit. Chihiro told Momoi to seize the opportunity to attack and successfully covered everyone to retreat.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄最终还是没能胜利。莉央指示时回收老师，但此时机体却出现了一丝破绽，千寻让桃井抓住机会对其攻击，成功让众人先行撤退。

desc.en: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.jp: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察尼禄与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察妮露与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。

desc.en: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.jp: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且尼禄尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且宁瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程师部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且妮露尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.en: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity. When Momoi asked how to actually make it, Yuzu reported her discovery.
desc.jp: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity. When Momoi asked how to actually make it, Yuzu reported her discovery.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。尼禄强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。宁瑠强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对季的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。妮露强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。

desc.en: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage on Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning well when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then formed a plan - with the usage of the "tricks."
desc.jp: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage on Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning well when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then formed a plan - with the usage of the "tricks."
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子确信尼禄对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问尼禄是否是在近距离作战时最优，尼禄表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子确信宁瑠对季造成了伤害。千寻指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问宁瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，宁瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子确信妮露对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问妮露是否是在近距离作战时最优，妮露表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。

desc.en: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千禧年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的尼禄的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。

desc.en: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.jp: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C一行人继续与时和她的机甲战斗。时起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将时逼进了室内。

desc.en: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.jp: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但尼禄不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。茜担心尼禄身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但宁瑠不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。朱音担心宁瑠身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但妮露不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。茜担心妮露身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。

desc.en: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.jp: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将尼禄打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉音授权季发射主炮，将宁瑠打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉音也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。朱音则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将妮露打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。

name.en: As Long As She Got Rescued
name.jp: As Long As She Got Rescued

desc.en: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium - as well.
desc.jp: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium - as well.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜仍然对尼禄的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但尼禄并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，尼禄可是有代号为“OO”——千禧年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音仍然对宁瑠的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但宁瑠并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。朱音对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。朱音同时还向莉音提到，宁瑠可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜仍然对妮露的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但妮露并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，妮露可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Neru got up from the ground, while Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had talked before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".
desc.jp: Neru got up from the ground, while Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had talked before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄从地上爬起，真理社也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在真理社特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，时和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠从地上爬起，贝里塔斯也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将季逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉音才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在贝里塔斯特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，季和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉音感慨“OO”的强大。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露从地上爬起，真理会也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在真理会特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，时和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部和老师终于遇见爱丽丝了。爱丽丝说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是爱丽丝终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。

desc.en: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.jp: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和游戏开发部一行人来到了爱丽丝的意识深处，在那他们见到了爱丽丝与Key。开发部想要带爱丽丝回去，但Key突然出现，并重新提醒“公主”她所见到的一切。

desc.en: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.jp: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的尼禄、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、尼禄负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与季对峙的宁瑠、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、宁瑠负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的妮露、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、妮露负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.jp: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及尼禄前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝想起了莉音。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉音时的情形，以及宁瑠前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及妮露前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第140首曲子，以主线故事中与爱丽丝的相关部分而熟知。

desc.en: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.jp: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千禧年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。

desc.en: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.jp: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.zh_cn: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn: 受到众人鼓励的爱丽丝拔出了在石头中的光之剑，重新回归勇者身份。Key极其惊愕地看着爱丽丝，希望爱丽丝能够行使作为“王女”的职责，但爱丽丝没听，用光之剑一炮轰了Key。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.jp: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于爱丽丝意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉央惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是游戏开发部所能做到的。最终，游戏开发部三人与爱丽丝团聚。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于爱丽丝意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉音惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是游戏开发部所能做到的。最终，游戏开发部三人与爱丽丝团聚。

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千禧年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。
desc.jp: 在阿拜多斯挖掘地發現某個東西的凱薩PMC，以及查覺到異變的對策委員會。聽到愛麗絲的身體沒有任何異常的訊息後，遊戲開發部覺得很開心。另一方面，陽葵確認隱藏足跡的莉音留下的情報。

desc.en: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.jp: 白子向對策委員會眾人報告了自己所看見的東西，指出這些天來PMC的軍力移動相當奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜進去看一眼，但被綾音提醒了之前的事情。這時有人提議詢問老師的意見；雖然害怕打擾老師，綾音還是讓老師有時間就來阿拜多斯一趟。
desc.zh_cn: 白子向对策委员会众人报告了自己所看见的东西，指出这些天来PMC的军力移动相当奇怪。大家表示同意。星野提出不如大家偷偷溜进去看一眼，但被绫音提醒了之前的事情。这时有人提议询问老师的意见；虽然害怕打扰老师，绫音还是让老师有时间就来阿拜多斯一趟。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 愛麗絲剛剛接受了工程師部和貝裡塔斯的檢查，並被要求要定期來訪。貝裡塔斯沒有找到Kei的痕跡，不過愛麗絲表示，下一次見到Kei時，她會更加大力地把她打飛的。

desc.en: 愛麗絲覺得“宇宙勇者”這個主意非常棒，暢想自己登上宇宙戰艦的那一天。據說工程師部正在不斷鑽研中。最後，桃井提出把遊戲換成“太空歌劇”為背景的“彈幕射擊遊戲”，這讓綠不是特別開心。

desc.en: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.jp: Kei一直在暗處看著愛麗絲。Kei理解愛麗絲想要擺脫自己“王女”的身份，但指出命運最終會讓她成為那樣。
desc.zh_cn: Kei一直在暗处看着爱丽丝。Kei理解爱丽丝想要摆脱自己“王女”的身份，但指出命运最终会让她成为那样。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.jp: 作為全千年最厲害的駭客，陽葵承擔下了對莉音建造的都市的善後工作――雖然更多像是莉音直接推卸了責任。陽葵訪問了莉音儲存的資料，這才發現她掌握的東西之多，同時也有些理解了她的偏執。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 作为全千禧年最厉害的黑客，日鞠承担下了对莉央建造的都市的善后工作――虽然更多像是莉央直接推卸了责任。日鞠访问了莉央存储的数据，这才发现她掌握的东西之多，同时也有些理解了她的偏执。

desc.en: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.jp: 季突然出現在兩人面前，嚇到了兩人。季表示莉音只跟她說了“以後自由生活吧”云云，但她並不知道怎麼做，於是就一直待著這裡。陽葵詢問季加入C&C的情況，季表示前輩們待她很好，但只是還有隔閡。最後陽葵決定，就此事先聯絡夏萊請求幫助。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时突然出现在两人面前，吓到了两人。时表示莉央只跟她说了“以后自由生活吧”云云，但她并不知道怎么做，于是就一直待着这里。日鞠询问时加入C&C的情况，时表示前辈们待她很好，但只是还有隔阂。最后日鞠决定，就此事先联系夏莱请求帮助。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季突然出现在两人面前，吓到了两人。季表示莉音只跟她说了“以后自由生活吧”云云，但她并不知道怎么做，于是就一直待着这里。阳葵询问季加入C&C的情况，季表示前辈们待她很好，但只是还有隔阂。最后阳葵决定，就此事先联系夏莱请求帮助。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时突然出现在两人面前，吓到了两人。时表示莉央只跟她说了“以后自由生活吧”云云，但她并不知道怎么做，于是就一直待着这里。日鞠询问时加入C&C的情况，时表示前辈们待她很好，但只是还有隔阂。最后日鞠决定，就此事先联系沙勒请求帮助。

desc.en: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。
desc.jp: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 学生们收到老师的联系后一一前往联邦学生会。为了解决眼前的状况，以琳为首收集情报与创建作战计划。为了拯救暴露在圣所的人，老师和圣娅开始寻找{cf葛叶}。听到消息后，仁耶表示搜索{cf葛叶}的任务交给自己。

desc.en: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.jp: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会一行人在列车站遇见了虚弱的白子。白子与她们发生了战斗，随后倒地。星野询问白子来自哪里，白子回答不知道。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 联邦学生会的琳由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托夏莱发布召集命令。琳随后拜托桃香和步代她处理在这期间的事情。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 联邦学生会的琳由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托夏莱发布召集命令。琳随后拜托桃香和步代她处理在这期间的事情。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 联邦学生会的琳由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托沙勒发布召集命令。琳随后拜托桃可和步代她处理在这期间的事情。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.jp: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 佳代子、优香、亚子、花子和绫音陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 佳世子、优香、亚子、花子和绫音陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 佳代子、优香、亚子、花子和绫音陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.jp: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.zh_cn: 阴阳部表示，葛业并不在百鬼夜行的学生名册上，但提到有一个地方记载了相关内容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立时，葛业设立了“百花缭乱”以调停纷争。尽管目前仍有传言百花缭乱的委员长会直接听命于她，但由于百花缭乱的正副委员长已经长时间无法联络，因而百花缭乱即将被废部――在似乎无望之际，仁耶提出了一个方法。

desc.en: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.jp: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于有了时的支援，超自然现象调查部两人的工作得以减少一部分。不过日鞠警告时说，时的装甲的力量在很大程度上与莉央的要塞都市有关，而在都市被摧毁的情况下，建议时只把它当作普通装甲看待。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于有了季的支援，特异现象搜查部两人的工作得以减少一部分。不过阳葵警告季说，季的装甲的力量在很大程度上与莉音的要塞都市有关，而在都市被摧毁的情况下，建议季只把它当作普通装甲看待。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于有了时的支援，特异现象调查部两人的工作得以减少一部分。不过日鞠警告时说，时的装甲的力量在很大程度上与莉央的要塞都市有关，而在都市被摧毁的情况下，建议时只把它当作普通装甲看待。

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，白子和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个白子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，白子和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个白子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，白子和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个白子。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 就在即將啟動時，莉音突然意識到方舟的狀態很不對勁，她立刻讓陽葵注意――情況表明，生命守護者本艦已被駭入。
desc.jp: 就在即將啟動時，莉音突然意識到方舟的狀態很不對勁，她立刻讓陽葵注意――情況表明，生命守護者本艦已被駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在即将启动时，莉央突然意识到方舟的状态很不对劲，她立刻让日鞠注意――情况表明，生命守护者本舰已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在即将启动时，莉音突然意识到方舟的状态很不对劲，她立刻让阳葵注意――情况表明，生命守护者本舰已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在即将启动时，莉央突然意识到方舟的状态很不对劲，她立刻让日鞠注意――情况表明，生命守护者本舰已被骇入。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.jp: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 船上，优香向日鞠询问情况，日鞠则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。优香表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 船上，优香向阳葵询问情况，阳葵则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。优香表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 船上，优香向日鞠询问情况，日鞠则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。优香表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 兩人記起那一位白子同學來，認定大概就是在那個時候。
desc.jp: 兩人記起那一位白子同學來，認定大概就是在那個時候。
desc.zh_cn: 两人记起那一位白子同学来，认定大概就是在那个时候。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.jp: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 白子遇見了誘騙者，她大喊他就是將她綁架的人。白子讓誘騙者不要輕舉妄動，畢竟夏萊的老師可是也在場上。誘騙者沒做什麼，說出了啟動箱子的密碼。白子立刻開槍。
desc.jp: 白子遇見了誘騙者，她大喊他就是將她綁架的人。白子讓誘騙者不要輕舉妄動，畢竟夏萊的老師可是也在場上。誘騙者沒做什麼，說出了啟動箱子的密碼。白子立刻開槍。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 白子遇见了诱骗者，她大喊他就是将她绑架的人。白子让诱骗者不要轻举妄动，毕竟夏莱的老师可是也在场上。诱骗者没做什么，说出了启动箱子的密码。白子立刻开枪。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 白子遇见了诱骗者，她大喊他就是将她绑架的人。白子让诱骗者不要轻举妄动，毕竟夏莱的老师可是也在场上。诱骗者没做什么，说出了启动箱子的密码。白子立刻开枪。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 白子遇见了诱骗者，她大喊他就是将她绑架的人。白子让诱骗者不要轻举妄动，毕竟沙勒的老师可是也在场上。诱骗者没做什么，说出了启动箱子的密码。白子立刻开枪。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.jp: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 一片烟中，白子发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似阿罗娜的名字――是对方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 一片烟中，白子发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是对方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 一片烟中，白子发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似阿洛娜的名字――是对方的，箱子。

desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的修復程式啟動，並且被入侵的生命守護者也將在800秒後啟動最終自爆程式。另一位白子向老師冷冰冰地宣告基沃託斯迎向終結的不可避性，並對著誘騙者稱呼老師的名字。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.宣布方舟的修复程序启动，并且被入侵的生命守护者也将在800秒后启动最终自爆程序。另一位白子向老师冷冰冰地宣告基沃托斯迎向终结的不可避性，并对着诱骗者称呼老师的名字。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。
